string-array.name: sum_array
string-array.item: Hello, my name is Cristian Sedano. I was born in Spain, and I am an app developer.

I was working as an electrician in Spain when the crisis begun. That is why I decided to study English and I moved to London. Once I got here I looked for a job in hospitality which helped me pay for my studies.

Currently I’m working for Pret a Manger, but since a year and a half I’m also studying app development. I always liked computers and for that reason I decided to find a way of making a living out of my passion. For that I started studying to be an App developer, mainly Android Studio and Swift. I have several apps in my GitHub account, so if you are interested you can have a look and get a practical example of what I can do as a programmer.
Thank you for your time, I am looking forward to hear from you and meet you in an interview where we can talk more in detail about the possibility of me working for your company. Kind regards,

string-array.name: edu_array
string-array.item: 2018 - Udemy, Learn to program using design patterns for Android 30 hours
2017 – Udemy, Android programming from zero 70 hours
2017 – Udemy, Learn to program in java 5 hours
2016 – Udemy, Create your android apps 20 hours
2016 – Udemy, Introduction to android app development 22 hours
